text: (Paigambarane) sangitalehi ki jari mi tyahuna adhika cangalya (dhyeyaparyanta pohacavinara) marga ghe'una alo ahe, jyavara tumhala apale vadavadila adhalale (tarihi tumhi tyanceca anusarana karala?) Tevha tyanni uttara dile ki, amhi te man'ya karanara nahita, je de'una tumhala pathavile gele ahe
